languages.text: "Допрос задержанного Ярта пришлось прекратить. Он, кажется, просто спятил и бормочет лишь, что его подбила на ложь Джиневри, а значит, его надо отпустить. Не думаю, что жестокостью, добротой или святой молитвой из него можно выудить еще хоть что-нибудь".

"The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."
languages.original_text: "Допрос задержанного Ярта пришлось прекратить. Он, кажется, просто спятил и бормочет лишь, что его подбила на ложь Джиневри, а значит, его надо отпустить. Не думаю, что жестокостью, добротой или святой молитвой из него можно выудить еще хоть что-нибудь".

traits.locale_text: "The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad, and only keeps mumbling that it was Jinevra who set him up to lie, so he must therefore be set free. I do not think we can get out anything else out of him with either cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

"The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad, and only keeps mumbling that it was Jinevra who set him up to lie, so he must therefore be set free. I do not think we can get out anything else out of him with either cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

"The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

"The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

languages.text: "Die Befragung des Häftlings Yart musste abgebrochen werden. Er scheint den Verstand verloren zu haben: Er beharrt darauf, dass Jinevri ihn dazu brachte, zu lügen und er deshalb freigelassen werden müsse. Ich bezweifle, dass wir aus ihm noch etwas herausbringen ... sei es mit Grausamkeit, freundlichen Worten oder heiligen Gebeten."
languages.original_text: "The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

traits.locale_text: "Die Befragung des Häftlings Yart musste abgebrochen werden. Er scheint den Verstand verloren zu haben: Er beharrt darauf, dass Jinervi ihn dazu brachte, zu lügen und er deshalb freigelassen werden müsse. Ich bezweifle, dass wir aus ihm noch etwas herausbringen ... sei es mit Grausamkeit, freundlichen Worten oder heiligen Gebeten."

languages.text: « L'interrogatoire de Yart a dû être suspendu. Il semble avoir perdu la raison et ne cesse de répéter que Jinevri l'a poussé à mentir et qu'il doit donc être libéré. Je doute que nous puissions en tirer davantage, que ce soit par la cruauté, la miséricorde ou même la sainte prière. »
languages.original_text: "The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

traits.locale_text: « L'interrogatoire de Yart a dû être suspendu. Il semble avoir perdu la raison et ne cesse de répéter que Jinevri l'a poussé à mentir et qu'il doit donc être libéré. Je doute que nous puissions en tirer davantage, que ce soit par la cruauté, la miséricorde ou même la sainte prière. »

languages.text: «Tuvimos que suspender el interrogatorio de Yart. Al parecer se había vuelto loco: no dejaba de murmurar que Jinevri le había obligado a mentir, y que por eso deberíamos dejarlo en libertad. Dudo que le saquemos nada más por mucho que recurramos a la crueldad, la amabilidad o las plegarias».
languages.original_text: "The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

traits.locale_text: «Tuvimos que suspender el interrogatorio de Yart. Al parecer se había vuelto loco: no dejaba de murmurar que Jinevri le había obligado a mentir, y que por eso deberíamos dejarlo en libertad. Dudo que le saquemos nada más por mucho que recurramos a la crueldad, la amabilidad o las plegarias».

languages.text: 「拘留者ヤートの尋問は中断せざるを得ませんでした。発狂したようでした。彼は、ジネヴリが自分に嘘をつかせたから、自分は解放されるべきだとひたすらに呟いているのです。残忍な行為でも、優しさでも、聖なる祈りであっても、これ以上何かを聞き出せるとは思えません」
languages.original_text: "The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

traits.locale_text: 「拘留者ヤートの尋問は中断せざるを得ませんでした。発狂したようでした。彼は、ジネヴリが自分に嘘をつかせたから、自分は解放されるべきだとひたすらに呟いているのです。残忍な行為でも、優しさでも、聖なる祈りであっても、これ以上何かを聞き出せるとは思えません」

languages.text: “对亚特的审讯不得不暂停。他好像已经疯了，无论问什么都只会喃喃自语，说是杰尼娃让他撒谎的，于是我们不得不放了他。恐怕无论采取什么手段，无论是残忍的刑罚、仁慈的诱供，还是虔诚的祈祷，都没办法再从他嘴里套出话来了。”
languages.original_text: "The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."

traits.locale_text: “对亚特的审讯不得不暂停。他好像已经疯了，无论问什么都只会喃喃自语，说是杰尼娃让他撒谎的，于是我们不得不放了他。恐怕无论采取什么手段，无论是残忍的刑罚、仁慈的诱供，还是虔诚的祈祷，都没办法再从他嘴里套出话来了。”

languages.text: "Tutsak Yart'ın sorgusunu ertelemek zorunda kaldık. Galiba aklını kaçırdı. Jinevri'nin yalan söylemesi için ona tuzak kurduğunu, bu nedenle de serbest bırakılması gerektiğini geveleyip duruyor. Gaddarlıkla, nezaketle veya kutsal dualarla yaklaşmamız fark etmeksizin ondan daha fazla bilgi edinebileceğimizden kuşkuluyum."
languages.original_text: "The interrogation of the detainee Yart had to be suspended. He seems to have gone mad: he just keeps mumbling that it was Jinevri who set him up to lie, and that he must therefore be set free. I doubt we will get anything further out of him, be it with cruelty, kindness, or holy prayer."
